Part_One: ^You're on your way to school as you see a girl waving in your general direction,

Wave_Back: ^You wave back at the girl as she runs past you and hugs her friend.
Ignore: ^You ignore the girl as she runs past you to hug her friend.
^You wonder how nice it would be to have a friend that would greet you like that in the morning.

Part_Two: ^You arrive at school and see that the lecture is on material you know already.

Sleep: ^You decide that the lecture wasn't worth your time as you close your eyes and sleep.
Awake: ^You decide to listen to lecture anyways.
^However, your eyes feel heavy after 20 minutes.
